thread.title: 11 Best CEOs to Follow on Twitter
thread.title_full: 11 Best CEOs to Follow on Twitter

title: 11 Best CEOs to Follow on Twitter
text: 11 Best CEOs to Follow on Twitter Written by: Seth Archer 06/30/15 - 5:18 PM EDT Tickers in this article: AAPL BOX CMCSA MSFT TSLA TWTR NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- It's Social Media Day, and over 15,000 people have already tweeted about the happening today. The day is a celebration of the impact social media can have on global communication, according to Mashable , which drummed up the idea some six years ago. So, in celebration of social media, or at least in acknowledgement of its presence in our lives, TheStreet has compiled a list of the best CEOs and business leaders to follow on Twitter. Some were included because they break news for their companies while others were chosen because their commentary about events, happenings, corporate actions is often news by itself. Here, in no particular order, is our list:
